name: PDFSaveOptions

properties.name: pDFPreset
properties.description: The max string length is 255 bytes. Name of PDF preset to use.
The version of the Acrobat file format to create.
properties.name: compatibility

properties.description: This control includes the None option for when the user is not complying with any PDF standard.
properties.name: pDFXStandard
pDFXStandardDescription
properties.description: This displays the description from the selected preset.
Preserve Illustrator editing capabilities when saving the document.
properties.name: preserveEditability

properties.description: Generate thumbnails for the saved document.
properties.name: generateThumbnails

properties.description: Should the PDF document be optimized for fast web viewing.
properties.name: optimization

properties.description: View PDF after saving.
properties.name: viewAfterSaving

properties.description: How should color bitmap images be compressed.
properties.name: colorCompression

properties.description: Tile size when compressing with JPEG2000.
properties.name: colorTileSize

properties.description: How should color bitmap images be resampled.
properties.name: colorDownsamplingMethod

properties.description: If zero, no downsampling, otherwise, the resolution to downsample color bitmap images to.
properties.name: colorDownsampling

properties.description: Downsample if the image's resolution is above this value.
properties.name: colorDownsamplingImageThreshold

properties.description: How should grayscale bitmap images be compressed.
properties.name: grayscaleCompression

properties.description: Tile size when compressing with JPEG2000.
properties.name: grayscaleTileSize

properties.description: How should grayscale bitmap images be resampled.
properties.name: grayscaleDownsamplingMethod

properties.description: If zero, no downsampling, otherwise, the resolution to downsample grayscale images to.
properties.name: grayscaleDownsampling

properties.description: Downsample if the image's resolution is above this value.
properties.name: grayscaleDownsamplingImageThreshold

properties.description: How should monochrome bitmap images be compressed.
properties.name: monochromeCompression

properties.description: How should monochrome bitmap images be resampled.
properties.name: monochromeDownsamplingMethod

properties.description: If zero, no downsampling, otherwise, the resolution to downsample images to.
properties.name: monochromeDownsampling

properties.description: Downsample if the image's resolution is above this value.
properties.name: monochromeDownsamplingImageThreshold

properties.description: Should line art and text be compressed?
properties.name: compressArt

properties.description: Draw trim marks.
properties.name: trimMarks

properties.description: Draw registration marks.
properties.name: registrationMarks

properties.description: Draw color bars.
properties.name: colorBars

properties.description: Draw page information.
properties.name: pageInformation

properties.description: The page marks style.
properties.name: pageMarksType

properties.description: Trim mark weight.
properties.name: trimMarkWeight

properties.description: Custom offset (in points) for using the custom paper.
properties.name: offset
bleedOffsetRect
properties.description: The bleed offset rect.
Link 4 bleed values.
properties.name: bleedLink

properties.description: PDF color conversion policy. Three choices are available: (1)No Color Conversion (2) Repurpose (3) Convert to Destination.
properties.name: colorConversionID

properties.description: When NoColorConversion is specified for Color Conversion, NoColorDestination is set.
properties.name: colorDestinationID

properties.description: If CMS is off, Don't Include Profiles is set.
properties.name: colorProfileID

properties.description: When CMS is on, the output intent profile is the same profile selected for Destination in the Color group box.
properties.name: outputIntentProfile

properties.description: This is an optional comment which, if present, is added to the PDF file and describes the intended printing condition.
properties.name: outputCondition

properties.description: If selected for Output Intent Profile Name, you can set the name of a registered printing condition.
properties.name: outputConditionID

properties.description: URL to the site where the specified output condition is registered. No validation is performed on the URL.
properties.name: registryName

properties.description: This indicates if manual trapping has been prepared in the document.
properties.name: trapped

properties.description: Include a subset of fonts when less than this percentage of characters are used.
properties.name: fontSubsetThreshold
flattenerPreset
properties.description: The transparency flattener preset name.

properties.name: flattenerOptions
properties.description: The printing flattener options.
Flattening printer resolution.
properties.name: printerResolution

properties.description: Create acrobat layers from top-level layers - acrobat 6 only option.
properties.name: acrobatLayers

properties.description: Require a password to open the document.
properties.name: requireDocumentPassword

properties.description: A password string to open the document.
properties.name: documentPassword

properties.description: Use a password to restrict editing security settings.
properties.name: requirePermissionPassword

properties.description: A password string to restrict editing security settings.
properties.name: permissionPassword

properties.description: PDF security printing permission.
properties.name: pDFAllowPrinting

properties.description: PDF security changes allowed.
properties.name: pDFChangesAllowed

properties.description: Enable copying of text 128-bit.
properties.name: enableCopy

properties.description: Enable accessing 128-bit.
properties.name: enableAccess

properties.description: Enable plaintext metadata 128-bit - available only for acrobat 6.
properties.name: enablePlainText

properties.description: Enable copying and accessing 40-bit.
properties.name: enableCopyAccess

properties.description: Considered for multi-asset extraction which specifies artboard range.Empty string will extracts all the artboards.Default is empty string.
properties.name: artboardRange

description: Options which may be supplied when saving a document as a PDF file.
